name: JFrog
tag_list: jfrog, maven, repository, java, ivy, gradle, nexus, archiva, artifactory, build-server, hudson, teamcity, bamboo
overview:
JFrog is the home of Artifactory â€“ the worldâ€™s first Repository Management Solution and ORACLE DUKE’s AWARD WINNER for innovative Java tools for developers.

The company was founded in Israel in 2008 by Yoav Landman, Frederic Simon and Shlomi Ben Haim following as their second venture and 10 years of working together leading the Israeli Java community.

As the first company to provide the Java community with a Repository Management solution in 2006, JFrog has established itself as a technology leader in the industry and aspires to continue setting the standards going forward.
